products.title: Brisk Cooling Series® Shoulder Insert
products.description:
• Brisk Cooling Promotes comfort and endures safety in high heat conditions.
  • Provides extended cooling comfort and heat stress prevention
  • Brisk Cooling is lightweight, durable and reusable
  • Activated by simply submerging in water
  • Cooling lasts for 5-10 hours & can be re-activated by re-submerging in water
  • Simple and easy to use
  • One size fits most
EVAPORATIVE COOLING TECHNOLOGY
Specialized fabrics and fibers create an advanced water management system, called ‘HyperKewl’.
HyperKewl absorbs, stores and releases water within the multi-layered structure.
The fabrics cool itself through evaporation and a chill effect is created.
Users can expect the evaporative cooling fabric to provide temperatures that are up to 15-20° cooler than the ambient temperature.

products.title: Brisk Cooling Series® Hard Hat Nape Protector
products.description:
• Protects your neck and keeps you cool from the sun while wearing your hard hat
  • Promotes comfort and endures safety in high heat conditions
  • Provides extended cooling comfort and heat stress prevention
  • Self-adhesive hook-and-loop tabs allow you to attach to the inside or outside of any hard hat
  • 2” wide high performance reflective material
  • Lightweight, durable and reusable

products.title: Brisk Cooling Series® Hard Hat Sun Shield
products.description:
• Promotes comfort and endures safety in high heat conditions
  • Provides extended cooling comfort and heat stress prevention
  • Elastic band to fit over most hard hats
  • 5/8” wide high performance reflective material with contrasting material

  • Cooling lasts for 5-10 hours & can be re-activated by re-submerging in water
  • Simple and easy to use
Hard hat not included

EVAPORATIVE COOLING TECHNOLOGY
Specialized fabrics and fibers create an advanced water management system, called ‘HyperKewl’.
HyperKewl absorbs, stores and releases water within the multi-layered structure.
The fabrics cool itself through evaporation and a chill effect is created.
Users can expect the evaporative cooling fabric to provide temperatures that are up to 15-20° cooler than the ambient temperature.

One size fits most

Care: Wash before wearing.

100% breathable 2-ply cotton holds up to extended washes and wear.

Individuals should be careful not to touch eyes, nose and mouth when removing face mask and wash hands immediately after removing.

products.title: Kids 100% Cotton 2-Ply Face Mask
products.description:
• 4.5 oz./yd², 100% combed ringspun cotton jersey mask
  • Ribbed cotton binding across the top, bottom and ear holes ensure comfortable all day wear
  • 2-ply
  • Washable/ Reusable
  • Breathable
  • CPSIA label located on package
  • Ideal for DTG, heat transfer, 1-color screenprint and pad print
  • Sold in poly-bagged packs of 50 face covers. 1 unit = 50 face covers.

One size fits most

6" W x 3 3/4" L

*Specs do not include the ear loops 

CARE: Wash before wearing.

100% breathable 2-ply cotton holds up to extended washes and wear.

Wash to sanitize after wearing. Dry completely in dryer for form fit after each use.

Individuals should be careful not to touch eyes, nose and mouth when removing face mask and wash hands immediately after removing.
